discourse_list.title: Executable beacon chain / integrating Eth1 "now" - X-Post from EthResearch

content.content: “We propose to get rid of this complexity by embedding eth1 data (transactions, state root, etc) into beacon blocks and obligating beacon proposers to produce executable eth1 data. This enshrines eth1 execution and validity as a first class citizen at the core of the consensus.”    Ethereum Research – 26 Nov 20    Executable beacon chain Special thanks to @vbuterin for the original idea, @djrtwo, @zilm and others for review and useful inputs.  TL; DR an eth2 execution model alternative to executable shards with support of single execution thread enshrined in the beacon chain. ... Reading time: 3 mins 🕑 Likes: 8 ❤
content.GPT-summary: The post proposes a solution to simplify the integration of eth1 data into beacon blocks by obligating beacon proposers to produce executable eth1 data. The proposal is an eth2 execution model alternative to executable shards with support of single execution thread enshrined in the beacon chain. The post thanks several individuals for their contributions to the proposal. The post may be of interest to those interested in Ethereum and blockchain technology.
